12133.content: Perhaps you're someone who likes giant breeds. Are you interested in a Great Dane, perhaps?
12133.title: What else do you have?

choices: I think Ginger might be too much for me...
121331.content:
Alright. We don't have very many Danes here, but we do have at least a couple. Come on in and meet our gals!

Ginger: Ginger is a newer pup, about a year and a half old. She's quite a handful, and isn't afraid to use her size to her advantage, so she really needs an owner who knows what they're doing with her. She's friendly and sweet, but she often gets into trouble because she gets bored easily and doesn't handle inactivity very well. If you can keep her under control, she's a wonderful dog, but, as you can tell by the fact that you're here considering working with her, her last family wasn't up to the challenge.

This big gal has gorgeous coloring, her white and black splotched fur looking not unlike someone had tried to paint it onto her. She has big, bright, green eyes that are surprisingly intense for a Dane, and has a black-spotted, jowly face that gave her an almost cartoonish contrast between her intense eyes and her droopy face. She's big, as Great Danes often are, but not all her weight comes from just her frame.

As a clear testament to how much trouble her old family had controlling her, Ginger sports quite the portly belly, as well as thick haunches and a broad back. Being unable to keep her out of most things, Ginger's appetite had been dictated primarily by the pudgy gal herself, the big Dane forcing her way into the pantry and fridge as she ate what she pleased, her family mostly unable to prevent her from getting into whatever she wanted. Currently pushing a hearty two hundred seven pounds, she's lost some weight here since she came here. Having arrived here at two hundred and forty pounds, Ginger was at the point where her previous family could essentially do nothing to prevent her food raids, the gal having grown too strong and too heavy for them to have done much to get her away from the foods she desired.

She's yours if you'd like her, but you need to know that she's not going to be a walk in the park.
121331.title: Yes please!

choices: Nephew Wolf decides to show off his size and strength.
Nephew Wolf decides to start devouring everything in sight.
131.content:
Once upon a time, a young animated anthropomorphic wolf who starred in 2 Warner Bros. Animation shorts now hare this and false hare lived with his Uncle Big Bad Wolf.

One day Uncle Big Bad Wolf had a few bathtubs full of extra fattening cupcakes without those wrappers around them along with an extra large bathtub that contained a giant dough nut for his nephew to eat as his nephew couldn't believe what he was seeing.

"So let me get this straight Uncle Big Bad a few of these bathtubs contain extra fattening cupcakes that don't have those wrappers around them, along with an extra large bathtub that contains a giant dough nut and you want to me eat all of this?" Nephew Wolf said.

"That's right Nephew after all you are a growing boy and after eating that giant dough nut you'll be a fat little giant." Uncle Big Bad said.

"Alright then since after all I am a growing boy and all that." Nephew Wolf said.

Soon enough Nephew Wolf began devouring every extra fattening cupcake in each bathtub he climbed into as his body weight and size started to increase as he climbed out of every bathtub full of extra fattening cupcakes he devoured as he waddled over to where the extra large bathtub that contained a giant dough nut as he climbed into the extra large bathtub and began devouring the giant dough nut until his body weight and size increased once more as Nephew Wolf rose of that extra large bathtub as he was now a fat little giant.
131.title: Wolf

1313.content:
There was once a feral wolf in the forest a fair bit away from humanity. He used to be a part of a pack, but he was more of an omega compared to the burly alpha. He was more of a weakling in the group and that meant he was given the least food for his small efforts. He left to prove to himself that he can be something on his own and to possibly come back buff and bulky to prove the other canines wrong.

There was one problem though. Catching food in the cold while being a lone bundle of sticks and fur isn't easy, fun or painless. Wandering around was tiring, seeing prey was difficult, and trying to chase the possible food was embarrassing on his part. He was pathetic on his own and he regretted going on his own. Being hungry was better than starving after all.

It took almost the whole day before seeing something intriguing. The wolf hid behind a tree, looking around it to see...
1313.title: Realistic wolf gains

13132.content: The wolf sniffed the air and picked up on the scent of something rare... Cooked meats? Cautiously, he stalked around the scent, closing in, until he saw the source, a lone wooden cabin. It was a humble structure to say the least, but just near the door the wolf saw his prize. A rack of meats was smoking over a fire. The fire scared the wolf, but he felt he could get at the meat if given the chance. So as the wolf stalked forward ever so slowly, he kept on alert. He noticed...
13132.title: A hermit's cabin.

choices: Chuckling and offering some meat to the wolf
131322.content: For inside the cabin, the hermit sat by the fire reading a book. Coincidentally, he sensed it was about time to go and check on the meat from his recent hunt. So he went to open the door to the cabin just in time to see the wolf stalking towards the meat. The hermit drew back for a moment, then stroked his bushy grey beard for a moment before...
131322.title: The cabin was not empty

choices: the backyard of a human family.
a meadow with a glistening pond.
134.content:
Once there was a deer. He was not a young deer, having come of the age where he could grow antlers, but he was not an old one either. The deer always stuck with his pack as they nibbled on leaves by quiet brooks in the depths of the forest. Life was peaceful and average.

That is, until one day when two deranged, rabid coyotes crossed paths with the herd of deer. Every doe and stag ran away from the vicious, diseased beasts, and the deer (the one this story is about) found himself in a part of the forest he had never seen before. He looked around, hoping he could find a way back to his family, but the direction from which he came smelled like the coyotes and he had no way of knowing which was his friends had gone. So he wandered for a while, hoping he could come across some way home.

Instead, the deer wandered into...
134.title: Deer

choices: the boy again, holding something that smelled delicious!
an adult human holding a tranquilizer gun!
1341.content:
The deer looked around once more. He had never seen a structure built by humans before. The tall home was surrounded by lawn on all sides, but beyond that were more trees. The house seemed to be decently isolated from most of society. In this backyard there was an apple tree with several ripe apples laying on the ground. The deer trotted over and munched on one, then another, as he was quite hungry.

Then the deer's ears perked up and he looked over to see a young human. The human boy was staring right back at the deer from a porch. He was about 10 years old, and was smiling, leaning over the railing. The two locked eyes for a minute. The boy held his breath, hoping not to scare the deer away. He then turned and hurried inside his dwelling. The deer continued to enjoy the apples.

Moments later, out from the back door of the house came...
1341.title: The backyard of a human family.

choices: the meat from various local wildlife his dad had hunted...
13411.content:
The human boy walked around the side of the house, holding a basket with a cloth covering it's contents. That didn't keep the deer from smelling what was inside, and whatever was inside the basket sure smelled good! The boy and the deer maintained eye contact as the the boy took step by step in the deer's direction until they were but a few yards apart. The boy then sat the basket down and took the cloth off, letting the scent of it's contents fill the air around them. He then turned and walked away, and once out of eyesight rushed up to the porch.

The deer trotted over to the basket and sniffed at the food in it. It smelled sweet and savory all at once. It certainly wasn't anything the deer would find in the wilderness. He munched at some of the food in the basket and found it tasted... delicious! The deer chewed up everything in the basket and licked it clean. Satisfied, he then trotted back into the forest to find a place to lie down.

The boy, who had been watching from the porch, smiled. He was happy that he could share some of his favorite snacks with the local wildlife! He didn't expect though that a deer would be so inclined to love the taste of...
13411.title: the boy again, holding something that smelled d...

choices: The house from the other day
134112.content:
The deer felt very satisfied as he wandered through the forest once more. He stopped to lie down for the night, and when he awoke again, he found himself rather hungry once more. He leaned over and nibbled on a leaf, but found it to be rather... unsavory. No, he was hungry for something like what was in the basket the boy had given to him. Those delicious meats, so savory, juicy and glistening with fat. The deer wondered if he'd ever taste something like that again.

The deer paced from tree to tree, hoping to stumble across something as filling and hearty as what he had tasted the day before, but not a single leaf, berry or fruit could satisfy him. Distressed, he laid down in some tall grass to think. Just then, a rabbit hopped by. Deer and rabbits seldom had reason to fear each other, so the rabbit bounced right by the deer's nose. The deer eyed the rabbit. He looked plump. So plump, as if hibernation started tomorrow. The deer's mouth watered. He craned his neck towards the unsuspecting ball of juicy, furry meat and gave into his cravings.

CRACK

CRUNCH

SLURP

Within ten minutes nothing remained of the rabbit but some tufts of fur, bones and some entrails the deer did not find to be quite as delectable. He raised his messy, matted head. THAT was a satisfying meal. The deer was now full, and quite content, but the taste of devouring another animal, the thrill of the hunt... it felt incredible, and the deer wanted more.

A ways away, the deer crossed by a squirrel who had taken his fair share of nuts. The deer nudged an acorn in it's direction, and as the squirrel scurried over he scurried right into the jaws of the newly awakened carnivore. CHOMP.

The deer crossed a brook in which he spotted a hefty fish whose size had gotten it caught between some roots. The deer happily liberated it from the roots and into his gullet.

The deer continued to prey upon the critters he came across until, with an overfull, distended stomach and a proud new role in the forest, the deer laid down to rest for another night. The next morning, as the birds songs met the tranquil sunlight, the deer rose onto his legs, wobbly. He felt groggy. No, not groggy, hungry. It took a few seconds for him to stand up fully. His stomach had receded from the binge the night before, but now hung an extra inch or two down instead with blubber.

The deer knew exactly what to do with this hunger now, and the thrill of the hunt brought him excitement to the point of lust. The deer sniffed the air and identified what would make his next meal. He headed in the direction of...
134112.title: The taste of flesh...

1341121.content:
The deer made his way towards a cliffside, at the bottom of which was a small, yet roomy enclave. The deer's belly jiggled to and fro with every trot yet he stayed nimble as he followed his nose towards the cave. Inside the cave was a bear. The bear was easily twice or thrice the size of the deer and thick with blubber that made it fat, even for a bear. Blood rushed through all parts of the deer's body at the thought of all that tender meat in his mouth, slinking down into his belly.

Driven by lustful hunger, the deer ignored fear and advanced towards the bear. The bear was lying down, facing away from the deer. Possibly asleep? The deer wasn't sure. Hesitantly, he leaned in and licked the backside of his prey...

13411212.content:
The back of the bear tasted like blood. The deer realized that the scent of blood that it had noticed earlier was not the scent of the blood of past victims that had been smeared into it's muzzle, but the pool of blood forming on the other side of the bear. The deer joyfully pranced around the bear and lapped at the blood which had oozed from a fatal gunshot wound in the bear's head, just grievous enough to let the bear return home before succumbing to death. The thick, still warm blood was savory on the tongue of the deer, who drank it like water. The deer gnashed at the side of the hefty corpse until fur gave way to flesh. The deer embedded his head into the hole he had made and feasted.

The bear, being so large, would be food for months for most carnivores. The greedy dear stayed by the side of his most joyous find and devoured it slowly, bite by bite, barely stopping to sleep, as his distended stomach lowered closer and closer to the ground with each swallow. It was quite a site, a deer who looked as if it had swallowed three watermelons tearing juicy flesh from the bones of it's natural predator.

In three days, the deer had eaten all that was worth eating on the bear, and his body had become bloated as a result. Holding incredulous amounts of flesh inside, the deer's belly sunk down half way to it's knees by virtue of sheer fullness, and the fat he had gained extended his stomach the rest of the way, just past his knees. His legs had become plump like sausages, with rolls on the thick upper legs overtaking the lower legs at the knee. His rear had become enormously round and blubbery, each cheek wobbling with every movement. The rear was so large his small, fluffy tail barely poked out from where it was propped up between the cheeks. The fat around his stomach and buttocks wrapped around his sides, giving him a spherical shape, and coating his back in a few inches of insulating flesh. From his neck dangled several chins, swaying to and fro with every movement.

Despite the deer's now immense size, each movement he made combined with protein from the meat, had strengthened his muscles, allowing him to keep mobility. The deer loved the feeling of his upper legs rubbing against his stomach. The feeling of fat flesh on fat flesh fulfilled a carnal desire within him, providing a sense of arousal. The deer now not only needed to continue his wanton feast, but he had to find something to do with this lust pumping through his body.

1341121231.content:
As the deer waddled about the forest, munching on smaller critters by dumb luck, he felt something he had never felt before in his life. Power. In fact, the young deer would gladly identify as a stag, greater than any of his former herd. With each morsel he ate, his belly widened with blubber, and the more girth that was on the stag, the more space he took up and the more he felt on top of the food chain. It was an exhilarating feeling, and with it came the feeling of wanting to mate.

Yes, as the top of the food chain the stag could have any mate from his herd. He felt his groin swell with that desire as this realization came to him, but alas, the stag had no herd. So for two full days, the stag went about gobbling down squirrels, raccoons, and even a lone wolf he got a jump on, yet he was constantly distracted by a painfully throbbing member.

It wasn't until the next day that he found relief as he woke up. The stag's distended, grossly obese abdomen now fit between his hind legs, and as he went about the morning routine of hefting itself up, he noticed his groin rubbing against his blubber. The blubber was soft, warm and moist with sweat and meaty juice. The stag curiously arched his back and wobbled his legs around, letting his fat jiggle against his throbbing cock. The tip of the cock, no matter what angle he prodded, found itself grinding into and sinking into his belly, and the bottom of the shaft was already engulfed in blubber, so as the curious arching grew into heated thrusts the stag's burning hot rod was rubbed on all sides. It was better than the stag could have ever imagined a mate being. Of course it would be, he was the alpha. Only he could bring himself this pleasure. The stag's whole body heated up as he felt the pressure of an ejaculation build up, and he knew that he had to have more. He had surpassed survival, it was now time to take the lead and thrive. He needed to grow more. Fatter. More belly to swallow up his cock and more belly to assert him as king of the forest.

13412.content:
The deer did not notice since he was munching on apples, but on the porch now was a hefty, bearded man in flannel, holding a tranquilizer gun. His movement onto the porch was surprisingly deft for a man who must have weighed well over 350lbs. It took a mere moment for him to aim the gun, take a deep breath and fire right into the deer's neck.

A few hours later, the deer awoke inside a room with wooden walls and a dirt floor. He stood up, but found he could not move much as all four of his legs were tied to posts with rope. A few feet away, the hunter was speaking to his son.

"So why didn't you just kill him, Pa?" The boy asked, warily.

"I told ya, boy, his meat'll be much better if we get to fatten him up first!"

"But Pa..." The boy looked over at the deer sadly. It wasn't his idea to come to this hunting lodge with his father, but when you're the age he was you don't really get to choose where you go.

"Jimmy, what did I tell ya? If you wanna be a real man like your pa, ya gotta be big like a real man! And if you wanna be big, you gotta eat like a real man too!" He grabbed his staunch, round gut from both hides and gave it a hearty shake. "This lil' guy's gonna blow up reeeeaaaaal nice, and then we'll have all that juicy meat to ourselves and you can get yerself a proper gut too!"

"Yes, Pa..." Jimmy, the boy, said, poking at his chubby belly. The father took his son under his meaty arm and the two left the shack, leaving the deer alone.

The deer, understanding none of what was happening, only knew that in front of him was a trough full of tasty looking feed. Seeds, berries, grains and some vegetable oil (for the extra fattening) were all mixed together and the deer was able to forget about his restrains as he ate. In fact, eating was the only thing the deer could do in his current position, so that's what he did. He ate and ate and ate more than he had ever eaten before. Every now and then the boy would come in with some more feed for the deer, who had begun to plump up...

info.brief_description: Watch some animals get fat, fatter and beyond!
info.description:
Ever want to have a pet put on loads of weight? Or see a wild animal devour a forest of food? Come on it and enjoy the blubber! Help these animals along as they grow to impressive sizes and beyond!

RULES:

-This is a weight gain story. Keep the main focus on weight gain. Inflation through air, water, blueberry, etc. is allowed, but please keep most of the growth fat related.

-Mature/sexual content is allowed, including between animals and humans and any/all gender comibnations

-Vore/scat/other related fetishes are allowed, just give prior warning that a chapter will contain it and allow an option for the plot to go another way for readers who enjoy the plot but aren't into that particular subject.

-Furries are allowed, but the animals this story focuses on are not intended to be furries.

-Keep the writing quality please. Really bad writing that hinders the flow of the plot may be removed, but not without prior notice explaining why.

-That being said, there's no minimum/maximum word count for a chapter.

-Have fun!
